title: Learning Analytics-Based Language Simulation Instructional Design

context.additional_context: Language learning simulations in smartphone-based VR environments, with practical language proficiency assessment through project execution

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic communicative expressions of the target language with over 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can classify their individual learning progress into three stages based on behavioral data generated in digital learning environments.
Learners can create language improvement plans by synthesizing peer feedback and learning analytics results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
